name: Lockdown Lover
description:
It feels like years since you've even seen another human. I mean, being inside for months isn't too hard, right? You got family, technology, food -- perfect. Wrong. You have none of those things (unless you count that weird ten year old tin in the back of your cupboard 'food'). Face it: You're alone. No friends. No family. All you have is the TV and the microwave and - oh - that cheap knock-off blender you swore you'd use as part of a New Year's Resolution which lasted all of 5 days. Would be weird if you started developing relationships with these things...

Lockdown Lover is a visual novel dating simulator in which you (yes, you!) develop relationships with your household appliances after a long and slippery fall down the slope that is called 'being a total loner and probably a loser who decided it would be a good idea to spend their month's wage on a TV instead of taking care of the basic necessities of survival' -- or something.

Make friends, foes and all else along the way to ensure that you are in fact the saddest person in the world (seriously, who wants to date a doorknob?).

**We're still early in development! Stay tuned to see the future of Lockdown Lover as we continue the story, adding more characters and branches that will keep you entertained.**
